page.title: 20MINI SURVEY-ETON WICK
page.content:
Mini Survey on Amenities
We asked 46 people including parents and old age pensioners about the amenities in the village.These are the results. 1{SHOPS ADEQUATE} 34 NEED BANK 2{SOCIAL CLUB " } 27 3{PUBLIC HOUSES" }18 11- TOO MANY 4{RECREATION GROUND }ADEQUATE 27 5{CHURCHES ADEQUATE}34 6{BUS SERVICES}BAD 38 NO SUNDAY SERVICE 7{EDUCATION}ADEQUATE 37 8{LIBRARY } " 29 BUT NEED MORE BOOKS 9{HOUSING FOR ELDERLY}ADEQUATE 35 10{JOBS FOR LOCAL PEOPLE}ADEQUATE 14 {11HEALTH}32 SAY NEED FOR HEALTH CENTRE 12 A{FRIENDLY PLACE}YES 35 13{CLUBS FOR WOMEN}ADEQUATE 19.
